backend/main.mo: Implements presale logic including contribution recording, allocation tracking, status queries, and enforcing a hard ICP cap of 515B e8s.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking a UI requirement about showing remaining ICP to the PresaleProgress.tsx file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files used in the presale UI.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for neon-themed light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all presale sections with animated neon background effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with attribution and dynamic tracking link.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Shows a 24-hour countdown with neon-styled time blocks.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the deposit address with copy-to-clipboard interaction and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Hero banner with large animated meme-doge image, headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Displays a three‑step guide for contributing to the presale along with key presale parameters and important notes.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Shows presale progress using data from usePresaleStatus, including percent complete, ICP received/remaining, and an end badge.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps the full presale status UI including countdown, parameters, progress bar, and deposit address.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Provides tokenomics details and a FAQ section using constants like max supply and presale cap.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines core presale constants such as deposit address, ICP cap, token max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches and polls the list of contributors from the backend actor using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24‑hour countdown timer that updates every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Fetches and polls presale status data from the backend actor using react‑query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, and custom neon-themed utility classes with multiple animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw Contribution records by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color variables, neon theme support, container settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s requirements, current state, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions.
